Home.description: Find meaningful connections and build lasting relationships
Home.heroDescription: Discover meaningful connections through AI-powered matching and emotional intelligence
Home.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to find and build meaningful relationships
Home.ctaTitle: Ready to Find Your Perfect Match?
Home.ctaDescription: Join HeartWise today and discover a smarter way to connect with people who truly understand you.
Home.dinnersEventsDesc: Organize shared meals and invite your friends.
Home.recipesLibraryDesc: Explore recipes and share your ideas.
Home.smartPantryDesc: Manage your stocks and avoid waste.

FeatureCards.dashboardDescription: Your personalized space for insights, stats, and quick access to features.
FeatureCards.geolocationMeetingDescription: Discover and meet people in public places near you.
FeatureCards.facialAnalysisMatchingDescription: AI suggests matches based on facial and psychological compatibility.
FeatureCards.aiConversationCoachDescription: Get AI-powered advice to enhance your chat conversations.
FeatureCards.riskyWordsDictionaryDescription: Check your messages for potentially ambiguous or sensitive phrases.
FeatureCards.blindExchangeModeDescription: Connect with someone new without seeing photos or profiles initially.
FeatureCards.gameDescription: Play fun games like Trivia and Time's Up to connect with others.
FeatureCards.speedDatingDescription: Join fast-paced, interest-based virtual speed dating sessions.
FeatureCards.chatDescription: Engage in real-time conversations with your matches.
FeatureCards.rewardsDescription: View your earned badges, points, and unlock premium features.

Auth.loginDescription: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
Auth.loginErrorDefault: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Auth.loginErrorInvalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
Auth.loginErrorInvalidEmail: The email address format is not valid.
Auth.signupSuccessDesc: Welcome to HeartWise! Your account has been created.
Auth.signupErrorDefault: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
Auth.signupErrorEmailInUse: This email address is already in use.
Auth.tokenRefreshErrorDesc: Unable to refresh your session. Please log in again.
Auth.logoutSuccessDesc: You have been successfully logged out.
Auth.logoutErrorDesc: An error occurred while logging out. Please try again.
Auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address to receive a reset link.
Auth.firebaseConfigErrorUserFriendly: The application is not properly configured to connect to our services. Please try again later or contact support if the problem persists.

GeolocationMeeting.title: Find Nearby Connections
GeolocationMeeting.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser.
GeolocationMeeting.meetingPlacesDescription: Public places near you for potential meetups.
GeolocationMeeting.nearbyUsersDescription: Connect with users in your vicinity.
GeolocationMeeting.noMeetingPlaces: No suggested meeting places found nearby.

FacialAnalysisMatching.title: Facial Analysis & Matching (Legacy - Manual)
FacialAnalysisMatching.description: Upload or provide URLs for two images to analyze simulated psychological traits and compatibility.
FacialAnalysisMatching.descriptionAiPowered: Upload or capture your photo, and our AI will suggest potential matches based on facial and psychological compatibility.
FacialAnalysisMatching.uploadOrCapturePrompt: Upload your photo or use your camera.
FacialAnalysisMatching.errorMissingImage: Please upload or capture your photo first.
FacialAnalysisMatching.errorAuthRequired: You must be logged in to find matches.
FacialAnalysisMatching.cameraAccessDeniedError: Camera access denied. Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings.
FacialAnalysisMatching.cameraNotSupportedError: Camera not supported or not found on this device.
FacialAnalysisMatching.matchesFoundDesc: AI has found {count, plural, =1 {one potential match} other {# potential matches}} for you.
FacialAnalysisMatching.noMatchesFoundDesc: The AI couldn't find suitable matches at this time. Try a different photo or check back later!
FacialAnalysisMatching.noMatchesFoundAfterSearch: No matches found based on your photo. Try a different photo or widen your criteria if applicable.
FacialAnalysisMatching.errorMissingImageUrl: Please provide URLs for both images.
FacialAnalysisMatching.partialFailureError: Could not complete analysis for both images.
FacialAnalysisMatching.invalidFileTypeDesc: Please upload an image file (e.g., JPG, PNG).
FacialAnalysisMatching.photoModerationFailed: Your photo could not be processed due to moderation issues:
FacialAnalysisMatching.inputModerationFailed: Your photo input could not be processed due to moderation policy. Issues:

FacialAnalysis.title: Facial Analysis
FacialAnalysis.description: Analyze your face for psychological insights

consent.title: Data Collection Consent
consent.description: Before we can analyze your facial features, we need your consent to collect and process your data.
consent.dataCollection: We will collect the following data points:
consent.dataUsage: Your data will be used for:
consent.accept: I consent to data collection and processing

AIConversationCoachPage.pageDescription: Get personalized tips and style suggestions to improve your conversations.
